snippet.title: Smoothcade Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎁 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2069020/Smoothcade

Smoothcade is a cute “clear the screen” modern-arcade game that features co-op gameplay for up to four players. 

Recover the missing golden blend through 100 platform-jumping, puzzle-solving  handcrafted levels with a ton of fruity critters!

| About 2Awesome Studio's Partner Initiative |

2Awesome Studio's Partner Initiative helps bring awesome games to players everywhere! 

Follow along for more exciting Indie game news:

▶️ https://linktr.ee/2awesomestudio
